attributes.action: Increase The Summer Holidays To 8 Weeks
attributes.additional_details: To give students the opportunity to have a longer rest and recuperate after a long hard working year at school.
attributes.background: Increase The Summer Holidays To 8 Weeks

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The length of school holidays are a matter for schools and local authorities.
